item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, December 4, 2024 at 1:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Egoless Engineering (244 points | 101 comments)
2. Intel announces Arc B-series "Battlemage" discrete graphics with Linux support (284 points | 466 comments)
3. Glojure: Clojure interpreter hosted on Go, with extensible interop support (57 points | 7 comments)
4. The Tube Computer (121 points | 38 comments)
5. Skia Canvas: Browserless implementation of the HTML Canvas drawing API for node (173 points | 59 comments)
6. Making a parallel Rust workload 10x faster with (or without) Rayon (41 points | 3 comments)
7. Creating a Proxmox or QEMU ChromeOS Flex VM (37 points | 12 comments)
8. My son (9 yrs old) used plain JavaScript to make a game, and wants your feedback (236 points | 152 comments)
9. Andy Grove: Rich, Famous, Smart and Wrong (2007) (3 points | 1 comment)
10. Phoenix LiveView 1.0.0 is here (179 points | 30 comments)
11. FTC takes action against Gravy Analytics, Venntel for selling location data (98 points | 91 comments)
12. Show HN: My C compiler compiled itself (49 points | 13 comments)
13. Dependency management fatigue, or why I ditched React for Go+HTMX+Templ (166 points | 158 comments)
14. Openlayer (YC S21) is looking for top-tier design engineers ( | hide)
15. My brand new digitizing workflow using a 25 year old film scanner (76 points | 36 comments)
16. Phishers Love New TLDs Like .shop, .top and .xyz (103 points | 134 comments)
17. Homography Explained with Code (4 points | discuss)
18. Tweaking Stunt Island's 30-year-old 3D engine (170 points | 38 comments)
19. Launch HN: Vocera (YC F24) – Testing and Observability for Voice AI (51 points | 19 comments)
20. EstyJS 2.0 (emulator for the Atari ST, written in 100% pure JavaScript) (28 points | 7 comments)
21. Amazon Nova (246 points | 96 comments)
22. Against 'Free Market Authoritarianism' (13 points | 6 comments)
23. On-scalp printing of personalized electroencephalography e-tattoos (41 points | 3 comments)
24. California teacher dies from suspected rabid bat bite (70 points | 101 comments)
25. The Curse of Markdown (105 points | 80 comments)
26. MyTimeMachine: Personalized Facial Age Transformation (27 points | 3 comments)
27. Automated reasoning to remove LLM hallucinations (5 points | discuss)
28. Text Editing Hates You Too (2019) (90 points | 35 comments)
29. Rust library for building no-boilerplate CLI apps (3 points | discuss)
30. Vintage digicams are an artistic statement (96 points | 176 comments)
